body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.  
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of personal information.  
Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand.
The conversation should be at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time and end the conversation.
Return the conversation formatted like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Good morning! This is Ryan Torres from Majestic Furniture Solutions. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, I'm Barbara Hill. I've been waiting for my couch to be delivered for over three weeks now, and it's still not here. I'm very frustrated.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern, Barbara. Let me apologize for the delay and any inconvenience it has caused you. Can I get your order number and the date of purchase, please, to look into this issue?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Certainly. The order number is A123BC456 and I purchased it on the fifth of June.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Barbara. Give me a moment to check the details of your shipping status.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I’ve checked the details, and it seems there was a mix-up with the shipping company. We will resolve this issue and ensure your couch is delivered by the end of this week.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Ryan. I just want to make sure I'm not going to be charged for the shipping due to this delay.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I assure you, Barbara, you will not be charged for the shipping. We will take care of all the necessary adjustments.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate that, Ryan. Thank you for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Barbara. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's it. Thank you for resolving this so quickly.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's my pleasure. Thank you for calling Majestic Furniture Solutions. Have a great day, Barbara!
